articles.title: Samsung One UI 7 Stable update still on hold for US users - Sammy Fans
articles.description: It’s been two days since Samsung resumed the One UI 7 rollout, but US users are still waiting for the update. The company first released the Hotfix build for the Galaxy S24 series and later expanded it to the Z Flip 6, Z Fold 6, and Fold SE. We understand the…

articles.title: GameStop, Target, and Walmart announce when their Switch 2 preorders start - The Verge
articles.description: GameStop, Target, and Walmart have shared exactly when you can try to snag a Nintendo Switch 2 preorder on April 24th. Best Buy has also said some details about its plans.

articles.title: Baldur’s Gate 3 is 20% off to celebrate its last major update - Polygon
articles.description: The latest update for Baldur’s Gate 3 delivers photo mode, cross-play, and new subclasses, and is currently 20% off for PC and Xbox.

articles.title: A new kids’ show will come with a crypto wallet when it debuts this fall - TechCrunch

articles.title: The Gigabyte GeForce RTX 5070 Graphics Card Is in Stock at MSRP for Amazon Prime Members - IGN
Teen's new bionic hands can literally go on solo missions - Boing Boing
articles.description: You know that dream where your hand detaches and raids your fridge for you? Just me? Well anyway, 19-year-old Tilly Lockey just made that a reality. As reported by Reuters,…
